hopobject.name: beagleepd
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.6) Gecko/2009011913 Firefox/3.0.6
hopobject.body: Beagle Board E-Ink Platform Driver is a port of am300epd.c (a platform driver for the Broadsheet E-Ink display controller on mach-pxa) over to the Beagleboard, and an open design for an interface adapter board that allows the beagleboard expansion header to be connected to the beagleepd interface board that contains the Broadsheet controller that controls the E-Ink panel.
hopobject.shortdesc: Beagle Board E-Ink Framebuffer Platform Driver
